trans-unit.source: Manages the path context for the current Web application.
trans-unit.target: 管理当前 Web 应用程序的路径上下文。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebContext"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebApplicationLevel"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebApplicationLevel"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The name of the Web site.
trans-unit.target: Web 站点的名称。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the root level of the current Web application.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 Web 应用程序的根级别的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the Web.config file that the current configuration object represents.
trans-unit.target: 当前的配置对象表示 Web.config 文件的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The path value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_location" name="location" href=""></xref> element that is currently being edited.
trans-unit.target: 路径值<xref uid="langword_csharp_location" name="location" href=""></xref>当前正在编辑的元素。

trans-unit.source: The current Web application's configuration path.
trans-unit.target: 当前 Web 应用程序的配置路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebApplicationLevel"></xref> object that represents the path level of the current Web application.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebApplicationLevel"></xref>对象，表示当前的 Web 应用程序的路径级别。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebApplicationLevel"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebApplicationLevel"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the application path of the current Web application.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 Web 应用程序的应用程序路径。

trans-unit.source: The application path of the current Web application.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 Web 应用程序的应用程序路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location subpath of the Web application.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Web 应用程序的位置子路径。

trans-unit.source: The location subpath of the current Web application.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 Web 应用程序的位置子路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current virtual path of the Web application.
trans-unit.target: 获取 Web 应用程序的当前虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: The current virtual path of the Web application.
trans-unit.target: Web 应用程序的当前虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current Web application.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 Web 应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the current Web application.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 Web 应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the application's configuration path.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，表示应用程序的配置路径。

trans-unit.source: The application's configuration path.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的配置路径。
